title: Task 1
description: Complete the user authentication flow for the application. This includes login, registration, and session management.

title: Task 2
description: Create the database schema for storing user data and their tasks. Set up migrations using Flask-Migrate.

title: Task 3
description: Implement the frontend UI for the task management page. It should allow users to view, create, and edit tasks.

title: Task 4
description: Set up automated testing for the API endpoints using pytest. Ensure that all routes are properly tested for success and error cases.

title: Task 5
description: Optimize the application for better performance. Profile the app and identify bottlenecks in both the backend and frontend.
